banner.text:
=> Meteor 1.0.4.2: MongoDB 2.6 and 3.0 support, performance improvements,
   Cordova upgrades, template-specific subscriptions, and more!

   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to
   Meteor 1.0.4.2 by running 'meteor update'.

=> Meteor 1.0.4.2: Fixes regressions in publishing packages and creating new Cordova projects in 1.0.4.

   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to Meteor 1.0.4.2 by running 'meteor update --patch'.

=> Meteor 1.0.4.2: Fixes a regression in creating new Cordova projects in 1.0.4 and 1.0.4.1.

   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to Meteor 1.0.4.2 by running 'meteor update --patch'.
